text: Dylan William Moran (born 3 November 1971) is an Irish comedian, writer, actor and filmmaker. He is best known for his roles in the British sitcom Black Books (2000â€“2004), which he also co-created, and the movies Shaun of the Dead (2004), Run, Fatboy, Run (2007) and A Film with Me in It (2008). He has won two BAFTA Awards for Black Books. Moran was born in Navan, County Meath. He is marred to Elaine. They live in Edinburgh, with their two children. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:Irish movie actors Category:Irish stand-up comedians Category:Irish television actors Category:Irish writers
title: Dylan Moran
